reviews.review: sıradışı güzel
Sin duda, el mejor juego al que he jugado estos últimos años. Es precioso, una historia muy currada, una ambientación brutal...

Für mich ist Bioshock Infinite immernoch eines der besten Spiele die (zum Glück) jemals das Licht der Spielewelt erblickt haben. 


Die Story ist immersiv und großartig - bisher eigentlich unerreicht, genauso wie die Atmosphäre, speziell die ersten Minuten in Columbia haben (für mich) Maßstäbe gesetzt, an die erstmal wieder jemals ein Spiel rankommen muss. 

Das Gunplay ist sehr gut, die Kräfte sind vielseitig einsetzbar - es gibt, wie in den Vorgängerteilen einiges zu entdecken, Audiologs, Easter-Eggs, Anspielungen auf die Vorgänger...

Selbst die Grafik ist für ein drei Jahre altes Spiel noch außerordentlich gut, wahnsinnig schöne Lichteffekte, die Stadt Columbia an sich, die Panoramen und (mehr oder weniger) abwechslungsreichen Abschnitte der Stadt laden förmlich dazu ein, stehenzubleiben um sichs mal genauer anzusehen.

Soundtechnisch kann man auch nicht meckern, stimmige Musik, außerordentlich gute Synchronisation in Deutsch (!) und Englisch (Troy Baker und Courtnee Draper sind der Wahnsinn!).

Sehr lobenswert ist außerdem der DLC (zumindest Seebestattung) in der man als quasi Prequel seinen Weg nach Rapture findet, bevor es zu dem wurde, was man in Bioshock 1 und 2 gesehen hat - normalerweise bin ich kein Fan von DLC´s, aber hier wars für die Story auf jeden Fall jeden Cent wert.

Fazit: Außergewöhnlich guter, storylastiger Shooter, den ich mir sogar ein drittes Mal kaufen würde, sollte jemals eine "Remastered" Edition davon rauskommen.  Kaufen!
The storyline hurt my brain <3

최근엔 바이오쇼크 인피니트만 할 정도로 굉장한 몰입감을 준 게임
물론 그만큼 재미도 있다.

일단 배경이 아름답기로 유명한 게임인 만큼 공중도시인 컬럼비아에 가는 순간 도시의 아름다움에 감탄했다.
웅장한 건축물과 정교하고 아름다운 건축물, 예쁜 동물들과 식물들 거기에 실제 도시에 온 것 같은 느낌을 주는, 그저 우두커니 서 있기만하지않고 상호작용을 하는 NPC들로 인해 말 그대로 도시에 생명을 불어넣은 것 같다.
배경만 구경하는 것이 아닌, 영사기도 보고 축제에 참여하여 미니게임도 즐기고 경품도 얻으며 마치 관광객처럼 컬럼비아의 이곳저곳을 정신없이 누비며 보고, 즐겼다.
역시 명성대로 눈이 즐거운 게임이었다.
그렇다고 도시를 구경만하는 게임은 아니다.

전투 시스템에도 상당히 공을 들인 것 같다.
FPS장르로 명시되어 있는 것 처럼 다양한 화기가 등장하지만 손 맛이나 연출이 크게 특출나지는 않다.
하지만 '활력'이라는 재미난 요소를 집어 넣어서 전투를 보다 전략적이고 흥미롭게 풀어나갈 수 있다는 점과 엄폐물이나 스카이라인 등 지형,지물을 활용하여 보다 효율적인 전투를 즐길 수 있었다.
또, 자칫 잉여가 되기 쉽상인 근접공격 역시 잘 보완 했는데, 근접공격에 도움을 주는 활력과 플레이어가 착용 가능한 아이템에 다양한 효과를 부여하여 근접공격을 요긴하게 써먹을 수 있게 만들었다.
활력과 무기를 은화를 지불해서 강화할 수 있는데, 하나하나 강화할 때 마다 의외로 뿌듯하다.

그리고 인피니트의 핵심이자 꽃이라고 생각하는 엘리자베스역시 빼놓을 수 없다.
엘리자베스는 부커와 컬럼비아를 누빌 때 많은 것에 호기심을 갖고 반응한다.
음악에 맞춰 천진난만하게 춤을 추고, 물건이나 배경을 바라보기도 하고, 부커에게 말을 거는 등
큰 애착을 지니게 만든다.
그렇다고 해서 그저 부커를 졸졸 따라다니는 NPC가 아니다. 전투에서는 최고의 조력자가 된다.
일단 엘리자베스는 무적판정을 받기 때문에 전투에서 지켜 줄 필요가 없다.
전투는 부커의 몫이다.
하지만 엘리자베스는 '티어'라는 고유의 능력을 이용하여 전투에 간접적인 영향을 주어 보다 수월하게 승리할 수 있게 만들어준다.
그 밖에 탄약과 소금,실드,체력키트도 가져다 주니 정말 감사할따름이다.
간간히 은화도 가져다 주며, 자물쇠도 열어주니 정말 최고의 조력자가 아닐 수 없다.
동료와 함께 하는 게임은 많다. 하지만 여태 껏 해본 게임들 중 엘리자베스만한 동료를 본 적이 없다.

그리고 인피니트의 스토리는 개인적으로 꽤 어려웠다.
스토리의 이해와 흐름을 위한 기능이 게임 곳곳에 있다.
이 게임 속에는 사소한 이벤트 하나하나에 복선과 암시가 나온다.
그럼에도 불구하고 녹음기까지 듣고, 보아도 어느 시점에서 부터 따라가기가 힘든데 이걸 마지막에 잘 풀어준다.
하지만 결과적으로는 스토리 역시 훌륭하다.

등장인물,배경,연출 등
정말 여러모로 인상적인 게임이었다.
플레이타임이 그렇게 짧은 편은 아닌데
왠지모르게 아쉽고 여운이 남는다.
게임이 좀 더 길었으면 싶다.
바이오쇼크의 다음 시리즈가 나오면
또 한번 모험을 떠나고 싶다.

Hands down, this is by far the best environment design game I've played, for FPS lover, you gonna love this game, the storyline is not that unique, but it was enjoyable, love the soundtracks/ambience.

Bioshock Infinite

"Overwhelmingly positive"? Are you kidding me?

For starters, that awful cartoony art style of Bioshock (where everyone has a big head), what's up with that? It is so incongruent with what these games are going for in terms of theme/mood (foreboding and horror).

Also, what`s with the frenetic Serious-Sam-like action? That too is completely at odds with the themes of the game. That the Bioshock franchise purports to be a "spiritual successor" to System Shock 2 is a cruel joke to anyone who played that game.

And finally, the plot. How does this make any sense? According to the game, Columbia was built by white nationalists who didn't like the direction the United States took after the Civil War. But why, pray tell, would they then go on to bring scores of black people to serve as slaves in their secret sky city? After seeing what happened to the Southern states, wouldn't that appear to them as a bad idea? Specially considering the amount of technology they had, why would they even need those slaves? One is left with the conclusion that the founders of Columbia just hated Irish and black people so much, that they were willing to risk having a slave revolt which would endanger the integrity of the city just to torture these people, at no economic benefit whatsoever.

Bioshock Infinite gave me quite the ride.

It really isn't like any other first-person shooter I've ever played, and you may find yourself pleasently surprised to find that, unlike most FPS titles today, it's story is truly captivating. The combat is great, but the use of vigors in combination with firepower, skylines, and envrionmental hazards may take some time getting used to if you really want fights to feel as fluid as the developers intended it to be. On a side note, I'm also very impressed with the way every event in the game seems to blend together so seemlessly, sans the loading screens between areas, of course.

I highly recommend this title.

The storyline in Bioshock Infinite is amzing especially towards the ending, I highly recommend, especially to fans of complex time-travel/ multiverse themed stories. It is so complex and crazy and just plain perfect. Loved it.

For me, Bioshock Infinite and its dlcs is a 10/10, simple as that. The story is confusing at first but when concluded leaves you both satisfied and full of questions. It is a complex game, nothing we really have seen before and thus feels very original. 

What shines the most is the story, voice acting and visuals of the game. The combat is nothing special but does not bring the game down in any way. 

I would absolutely recommend this game to anyone who is looking for a beautiful game with alot of mysteries for you to find out. It never feels slow or boring, there is always something that keeps you going forward and thriving for more. This is absolutely one of the best games I have ever played.

Perhaps one of the greatest Sci-Fi Stories ever told. BioShock Infinite connects both previous BioShock games into a gigantic, Cross-Universal Time Paradox. If you like Quantum Superpositions, Tears in the Fabric of Reality, Time Paradoxes, Interdimensional Travel, Running into other versions of yourself, or anything to do with Theoretical Physics in General, this game is definitely for you.

初见“天空之城”哥伦比亚，宛如进入了童话中的国度，棉花糖一样的白云上漂浮着的精致建筑，横跨天际的空轨，宏伟圣洁的雕像，漂浮着的飞空艇，19世纪末的的美国混进了奇怪的先进科技线。可爱灵动的蜂鸟追逐着盛开的玫瑰，纤尘不染的风景；衣着得体的市民在旁安详的祈祷，惬意的调情，无忧无虑地生活，一切都显得那样超凡唯美。
然后黑暗突然撕裂了一道口子，混乱和矛盾也不断显现，祥和唯美与疯狂残酷交错，剧情也在这种强烈的反差下不断推进，显示出了强大的戏剧张力。 随着游戏的进行，此前的惊艳变成了浓浓的讽刺，浮华艳丽的表面下潜藏着可鄙的现实。而被关在塔中的美丽公主--伊丽莎白的出现，仿佛一道希望照亮了世界。（ps: 萝莉（少女）和大叔一直是BioShock系列的一贯组合，伊丽莎白的模样感觉有点像《这个杀手不太冷>里的玛蒂达，也轻易的激发起大叔心中的英雄主义和保护欲——无论付出什么代价，都要保护好这个女孩）
游戏里剧情和哲学耐人寻味，要细心找寻每一个录音机，有助于了解故事线索。剧情就不剧透了，总之我点一百个赞。

Very good game, definitly worth my money. sucks how they only give you 2 weapons and powers. But very nice graphics, hot lady, and of course hands down the best storyline I have ever played. If you havent played this game, then youre freaking missing out.

Fiquei surpreso com o jogo. Aquela parte em que sobe do oceano até Columbia é muito bacana. Sair de um local feio e com chuva até uma cidade que literalmente voa é muito lindo, é de cair o queixo. Mais incrível ainda é que isso acontece tudo em 1913, quando o avião tinha acabado de ser inventado. A cidade é meio que uma mistura de ficção científica com Inglaterra vitoriana. Tem uma arquitetura e moda típica da época, misturado com robôs, dirigíveis e monotrilhos.

O que mais intriga é ver que mesmo uma cidade muito avançada no tempo marcava traços típicos daquela época, como o racismo e autoritarismo. Com efeito, a cidade tem uma tecnologia tão avançada quanto a que usamos atualmente, mas é governada em uma espécie de ditadura, e onde negros e asiáticos são tratados como lixo.

Toda a história é ambientada nesse cenário maluco e conta basiacamente a missão de Booker DeWitt, protagonista da história, tentando salva Elizabeth, filha do messias Comstock, ditador da cidade. Todo o contexto é bem fantasioso e difícil de entender. Tem que ficar atento a cada diálogo e personagem que aparece, porque mistura viagens no espaço-tempo, revoluções, magias e uma série de outras coisas. Tanto é verdade, que tive que procurar na internet o final da hitória interpretado pra poder entender o que estava acontecendo.

Recomendo a todas/os, principalmente pela ambientação e pela história, que é bastante complexa e interessante. O jogo seria melhor se os combates fossem mais bem elaborados. As batalhas são todas muito simples, resume-se em atirar, pegar cover e soltar magiazinha. Tudo muito básico. Pra quem espera um shooter mais desafiante e não liga tanto pra história fica a dica: tem jogo melhor por aí.
very good. nice story line + gameplay. negative = NO FREE DLC!!!

One of the most beautiful games of the last few years as a package. You only have to play through the first half hour to feel rewarded for playing the game. Yes the graphics are fine, but the ambience, characters and world creation are another notch in the belt for 2K for the Bioshock games. I played this with the headphones on to immerse in the rich, steam punk environment. Elizabeth following Booker De Wit around is a fantastic story inclusion. You feel for the poor girl, even though you don't know why you are trying to abduct her (that is about as much story as you need - if it makes you feel better, lets call it a 'rescue'). The mystery and character story unfolds in true Bioshock fashion as you unravel the question of why Columbia (the floating city, equivalent to Rapture in Bio1) was made in the first place.

Bioshock Infinite is a story by FPS experience. I have not managed to do another playthrough, rather I will wait till the story fades from memory. Yes you can go through on a higher dificulty and aim for a 100% run, but it doesn't have the same sparkle (purchase decision point for some people). For a story experience with a side of shooting, this is top 3 of any game, and will be considered a classic of the period.
НУ как в этот шедевр не поиграть ? советую)

Bioshock Infinite (not Infinity, as I've heard some idiots pronounce it) is like a big, long, beautiful... movie. The graphics are gorgeous and the audio presentation is top-notch. I do wish that the musical score wasn't mostly atonal, but there are a couple memorable numbers.

Seeing as how the game plays out mostly linearly, the experience breaks down into "exploring" (mostly just sight-seeing), combat, and then looking around for trinkets and ammunition. The first time will last you about 7 hours and it's very much worth it since it's a really good movie. With these points in mind, I wouldn't pay more than a movie for this game. 

Check out my full review below (warning, SPOILERS):

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MveEiWD8Uy0

However, everything rapidly goes down the tubes the second he allows a bunch of shifty minorities access to firearms.

10/10, would kill everything again.

One of the best game a gamer could play. Its basically a must have if you love a game with amazing graphics, gameplay, and also one of the best stories in a game i have ever seen in my entire life. I rate this game a 10/10 so get it on a steam sale next time one come around.

Одно слово - шедевр!
После прохождения игры, да и во время самого прохождения меня переполняли позитивные эмоции. Первая моя реакция от увиденной Колумбии: "Вау!" вслух. 

Bioshock Infinite - лучшая игра в серии, как сюжетом и графикой, так и геймплеем. Очень атмосферна и интересна, ещё ни одна игра не вызвала у меня такого приятного послевкусия, как эта. После мрачного, насыщенного злом Восторга, яркая и красочная Колумбия кажется раем (а ведь рай и должен быть в облаках, не так ли?). 

Особую атмосферность игре дала русская локализация от CGInfo. Перевод почти абсолютно всех текстур: от текста газеты абсолютно не относящейся к сюжету до вывесок ВСЕХ лавок. А также эмоциональная, профессиональная озвучка. Низкий поклон ребятам.

Ну и главное - Элизабет (куда же без этого очаровательного, незабываемого персонажа?). Не могу описать её, это чудо надо просто один раз увидеть.
Плюсы:
Замечательный сюжет
Графика на очень высоком уровне
Геймплей. Понравилось решение разработчиков в ношении максимально всего двух видов оружия, что сподвигает игроков на более активные действия
Легкая в освоении система улучшений
Атмосфера
Красочность
Желание пройти игру ещё раз
Минусы:
Главный минус игры в том, что невозможно найти минусы

Игра стоит своих денег и даже больше. Покупайте, не пожалеете!

∞ Элизабет из 10 (если вы понимаете, о чём я)

Захватывающая история, наполненная запоминающимися персонажами, резкими сюжетными поворотами и яркими образами. Тщательно, до мелочей,  продуманные детали и атмосфера, меняющаяся абсолютно непредсказуемо, заставят провести в этой вселенной не один час. Гротескная сатира и карикатурная передача характеров представляет собой немного гипертрофированную нашу реальность, со своим расизмом, нацизмом-мистицизмом и проверенной веками фабулой - спасение принцессы от дракона. Перед нами еще одна блестяще стилизованная антиутопия, реализованная именно с тем геймдизайнерским перфекционизмом, который обеспечивает безупречную выверенность интонаций, красок и форм. BioShock Infinite воспринимается не иначе, как произведение искусства и по полученному эмоциональному посылу сравнима с хорошей книгой или фильмом, которые прочитываются/просматриваются на одном дыхании.
Это просто шедевр. Финал выносит мозг.
You either die a hero, or live long enough to see yourself, and yourself, and yourself, and yourself and yourself....

趁着不想干正事的时候一口气通完就是爽！
在没打到结局的时候我觉得这一个系列讲的分别是自由主义、极权主义、宗教崇拜。打到最后伤溪河受洗才反应过来，这都是在救女儿啊！总结起来就是平行世界的同一个主角为了女儿拳打 big brother ，脚踢 big sister ，胖揍夜莺，最终直面BOSS[spoiler] 结果发现最大的boss就是另一个自己[/spoiler]的故事。
本作画面精良，枪械多样，主角可以施法[spoiler]搓火球[/spoiler]，并且剧情足够引人入胜[spoiler]烧脑[/spoiler]，女儿也很萌！[spoiler]不如 little sister！[/spoiler]可以算是绝对的佳作！建议喜欢“好好讲故事类”游戏的玩家入手。
外附吐槽：这一作的录音带好难找，我按着主线跑的结果好多都没收集到，感觉比一代有所退步。
what kind of name is booker anyway.

I have enjoyed playing this game so far. The story taking place in 1912 while still having these aspects that would be beyond the point in history appeals to me. I like the fact that the game is not overly complicated to play but still maintains the challenge. It is incredibly helpful to not have to portect Elizabeth (the girl you are sent to Columbia to get). She offers some aid however, it is not what you really need 100% of the time. You could be near death and she will find ammo for you. 

My biggest complaint about the game thus far is the inability to save on demand. If you need to leave and stop playing you might've just lost a bit of progress and will have to replay. My secondary complaint is I am used to being able to carry more than 2 guns. The game does a well enough job of having guns you can swap out laying arround but I prefer to be able to carry a few of them.   

Still I am anxious to see how this story finishes.
Игра про бабу и мужика и еще дед там есть , вроде все .

Alors voila, pour avoir finit ce jeu 2 fois, en m'eclatant pendant des heures et des heures à chercher des secrets, des crochets, des voxophones, tenter de nouvelles combinaisons de pouvoir, d'armes, d'ameliorations...
Ce jeu est tout bonnement génial!! Deja que les anciens bioshock étaient déjà incroyables avec un gameplay prenant au tripes avec un coté sinistre dans une ville sous l'eau oû personne ne vous entendra hurler à part des p*tain de chrosomes, là les développeurs ont encore tout défoncé en changeant  totalement de milieu ( cette fois une ville dans le ciel grandiose ) en laissant tomber le flippant et l'inquiétant pour se tourner vers la dégénérescence totale d'une ville pourtant acceuillante et utopique aux premiers abords! Ce jeu est bien pensé, bien fait, bien réalisé et vous fera réfléchir, aussi bien pour l'histoire que pour la methode de combat!! De plus l'ajout de l'aérotram modifiera le gameplay et vous permettra aussi bien d'admirer les décors (super bien fait!) que de vous jeter pour éclater les adversaires!!
Non franchement ce jeu, je vous le recommande totalement voila! Lorsque vous y jouerez vous comprendrez à quel point j'ai raison XD
This is a boring badly written game. If you want a good fps play Half Life 2 or Metro 2033.
Cant wait for the next one (if there is a next one)

Esse game é excelente não sentir que estava jogando apenas um game mais sim lendo um bom livro ou admirando uma obra de arte. Ambientação retro do game faz você se sentir parte daquele universo, personagens carismaticos a Elisabeth parece que esta viva, a gameplay tem uma boa variação de armas e poderes, a cidade de Columbia transparece a utopia que ela representa deixando você mais curioso sobre jogo.Este game tem harmonia entre gameplay, enredo e personagens algo bem dificil de se construir. Algo que me incomodou foi falta de inimigos mais impactantes no jogo com Big daddy do primeiro Bioshock por exemplo e uma maior variedade de inimigos outro ponto importante é em relação as DLCs a Burial at Sea já que ela fecha a historia as mesmas são curtas e o enredo não tem o impacto da campanha principal mas tem gente que gosta outros não. Enfim recomendo este game pois é um tipo de jogo raro nos dias de hoje.

Ein absolut grandioses Meisterwerk der Videospielgeschichte. 
1A umgesetzt, fantastisches Setting.
Für mich wohl eines der besten Games aller Zeiten. Eine Story wie diese und das Storytelling hat es noch nie vorher gegeben, das ist echt Wahnsinn.
So viele Hüte wie ich ziehen will kann ich mir nicht kaufen, Herr Ken Levine. 
Absolut geil. DRINGENDE KAUFEMPFEHLUNG!

The last chapter is the darkest.  The 'good' endings in the previous two games were pretty dark (especially #2).  But this one takes the cake on just how dark the game can get.  Great gameplay, the skyhook fighting is amazingly well done and fun to use.  the graphics are beautiful, the characters are funny.  You really have to re-play the game to get the jokes the two 'twins' are making throughout the game (particularly at the start of the game, you won't understand their conversation unless you re-play it).  The optional scene of playign the song was truely haunting and surprising in the middle of the game (the guitar).  I definately recommend it.  The story was not as fun as the first, but good.

This is one of those games that will make you feel too much. A game that you will hold. A game that is memorable.

Very, very recommended. You will not regret it.

-Extraordinary Graphics 
-Interactive Gameplay
-Beleivable Characters
-Story Rich
-Elizabeth

Говорить о серии BioShock можно бесконечно много.
Что же касается BioShock Infinite то тут все просто.
 В этой игре вас ждет: 
  -Отличная графика и визуальный стиль.
  -Колоритные персонажи и неординарные ситуации.
  -Шикарный сюжет и проработаный мир.
  -Шутерная составляющая на очень высоком (но не идеальном уровне).
  -Одна из лучших игровых озвучек. (Локализация от "CGInfo", а не steam версия)
 
 BioShock Infinite - это уникальный проект, который раскажет вам удивительную историю и подарит массу эмоций которые еще надолго остануться в памяти. Один из шедевров игростроя, которых к слову сейчас не так много. Рекомендуется к приобритению всем без исключения.
